connector.description: A Kamelet that can consume events from an Apache ActiveMQ Classic message broker using JMS

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.destinationType
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.description: The JMS destination type (i.e.: queue or topic)

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.password
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.description: Target AMQ Broker password Example: password1!

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.username
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-source.description: Target AMQ Broker userName Example: userName
